title: Snark Busters: High Society v1.0
description:
Test your wits with mind bending puzzles and extreme hidden object fun in Snark Busters: High Society! Solve a devious crime, one that has been pinned on an innocent person. Bring light to the truth, and solve the mystery once and for all. Let your inner detective out, and save the day!

This intense tale of love, envy, and revenge will have you firmly planted in the story and wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t let go until the very end. You will be tasked with solving challenging puzzles that would leave anyone else scratching their head. Travel through mirrors to worlds completely backward, and speak with charming ghosts who will give you quests to play through to advance the story and thicken the plot. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s time to play, and catch the Snark!
